name: Once Upon A Life
description:
In a time and place where the environment has become uninhabitable and humanity is forced to live in domed cities, there is one life whose decisions may affect the lives of everyone they know.
That life is now yours.

A short and simple visual novel about life, death, and choices.

All music created by Mary:
http://agnello-pecora.chu.jp/CAMeLIA/index.html

(Originally meant to be the first VN I would release publicly back in late 2018, but ended up having a change of plans. After making some minor adjustments the past few weeks, I'm uploading this now so I have another VN to share and in case I'm unable to make something for this year's NaNoRenO game jam.)
